item.title: beacon.min.js - 2024-06-11
item.description: Enhanced to include reporting of Server-Timing headers.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2024-05-22
item.description: Introducing new metric fields, transferSize and decodedBodySize are included.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2024-04-17
item.description: Introducing new metric fields, deliveryType (dt) and navigationType (nt) are included.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2023-07-25
item.description: Fixed ETag format in the response header.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2023-07-13
item.description: Fixed the issue that was causing an illegal invocation error.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2023-04-19
item.description: Reports additional LCP diagnostic information using web-vitals library’s attribution build.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2023-04-06
item.description: Updated webpack configuration to output code in ECMAScript 3 (ES3) format.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2023-03-23
item.description: Updated Google’s web-vitals library (version 3.1.1) and removed experimental server-timing header.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2022-10-17
item.description: Updated to report new metrics such as time to first byte (TTFB), interaction to next paint (INP), and first contentful paint (FCP). Additionally, it reports navigator.webdriver, server-timing header (experimental), and protocol info (nextHopProtocol).

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2021-11-16
item.description: When using the automatic installation feature of the JavaScript Beacon (available only to customers proxied through Cloudflare - also known as orange-clouded customers), Subresource Integrity (SRI) is now enabled by default. SRI is a security feature that enables browsers to verify that resources they fetch are delivered without unexpected manipulation.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2021-09-01
item.description: Improved to report debugging information for Core Web Vitals.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2021-05-28
item.description: startsWith function replaced with indexOf function, which prevents rendering if multiple beacon scripts are loaded.

item.title: beacon.min.js - 2021-05-12
item.description: Reporting endpoint changed from /cdn-cgi/beacon/performance to /cdn-cgi/rum (for Browser Insights only).
